changelog:
**Enhancements:**
- feat(templates): add brainstorm command to all 5 platform templates (claude/iflow/opencode/cursor/codex) with platform-specific command syntax — previously only existed in deployed dirs, never generated by `trellis init/update`

**Documentation:**
- docs(templates): add brainstorm references to start commands across iflow/opencode/cursor/codex — adds Complex Task classification, brainstorm-first workflow section, and command table entry (matching existing Claude start.md)
notes: No migration required. Template-level changes only — run `trellis update` to sync.
